sentence: Television personality and Republican candidate Dr. Mehmet Oz spoke at Grove City College Wednesday about his run for United States Senate in Pennsylvania.
title: Dr. Oz Avoids Question on Abortion to Hide How He Supports Some Abortions

sentence: The complete poll results: Mehmet Oz: 27.4% David McCormick: 15.9% Carla Sands: 14.8% Kathy Barnette: 8.9% Jeff Bartos: 6.6% Sean Gale: 1.9% George Bochetto: 1.6% Everett Stern: 1.5% There were still 21.6% of likely GOP Senate primary voters undecided.
author: Eric Mack
title: Trafalgar Poll: Dr. Oz Takes Big Lead in Pa. Race

sentence: Monday's debate did not include high profile candidates such as the celebrity doctor Mehmet Oz and former George W Bush official David McCormick, both of whom took flak for skipping the event.
author: Io Dodds
title: Republican candidate denounces Michael Flynn as a ‘traitor’ during bad-tempered GOP debate

author: Paul Muschick
title: Dr. Oz, other carpetbaggers insulted Pennsylvania voters by skipping Senate debate

sentence: Dr Mehmet Oz, who is running for one of Pennsylvania’s two senate seats, is being mocked online for his second attempt at challenging Dr Anthony Fauci to debate him, despite the fact that the leading expert in infectious diseases is not opposing him.
author: Oliver O'Connell
title: Dr Oz ridiculed for complaining Fauci won’t debate him

sentence: “Now all of a sudden [it] is the first question in their multiple choice.” No representatives for daytime television star Dr. Mehmet Oz or Montgomery County real estate developer Jeff Bartos, who are also candidates in the race, responded to The Federalist’s inquiries.
author: Tristan Justice
title: 5 Pennsylvania GOP Senate Candidates Refuse Philadelphia Inquirer’s Grossly Biased Survey, Torch Paper As A ‘Biased’ ‘Rag’

author: Marc Levy
title: Forum gets tense in GOP’s sharp-elbowed Pennsylvania US Senate primary

sentence: A new WHTM/Emerson College Polling/The Hill Pennsylvania primary poll shows David McCormick and Mehmet Oz continuing to lead in the Republican race for one of Pennsylvania’s U.S. Senate seats.
author: Duke
title: Did Donald Trump Just Burn Some Bridges With His Base Over the Dr. Oz Endorsement?

sentence: When undecided voters were asked they are leaning towards at this time, McCormick’s lead increased to 27.2%, followed by Mehmet Oz with almost 20.6%.
author: Karen Townsend
title: Why did Trump endorse Dr. Oz? One person's support may hold the answer

author: Dave Goldiner
title: Dr. Oz boasts Trump endorsement but rivals slam record on abortion, guns and trans rights
